captions.text:
We are looking at Selena
Gomez today, who seems to
have found a perfect balance
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
between her business empire and
her personal life.
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
It is a fascinating evolution,
Gary. Her company, Rare Beauty,
is now valued at approximately
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
two billion dollars. She has
resisted selling it, showing she
is focused on long-term growth
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
That level of institutional thinking
is rare in the celebrity
world. She is also using
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
her platform for something substantial
with Wondermind.
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
Yes, she is very vocal
about mental health advocacy. Her
Rare Impact Fund has a
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
goal of raising one hundred
million dollars for services. It
is about de-stigmatizing the conversation
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
And she is still very
active in her craft. The
buzz from Cannes for Emilia
captions.speaker: A

captions.text:
It really is. She shared
a Best Actress ensemble award
there. She is also preparing
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
to play Linda Ronstadt in
an upcoming biopic. Between that
and Only Murders in the
captions.speaker: B

captions.text:
Building Season 4 returning August

Yet, she still finds time
for her personal life, sharing
new photos with boyfriend Benny
captions.speaker: A

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: We are looking at Selena Gomez today, who seems to have found a perfect balance between her business empire and her personal life.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: It is a fascinating evolution, Gary. Her company, Rare Beauty, is now valued at approximately two billion dollars. She has resisted selling it, showing she is focused on long-term growth rather than a quick payday.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: That level of institutional thinking is rare in the celebrity world. She is also using her platform for something substantial with Wondermind.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: Yes, she is very vocal about mental health advocacy. Her Rare Impact Fund has a goal of raising one hundred million dollars for services. It is about de-stigmatizing the conversation for everyone.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: And she is still very active in her craft. The buzz from Cannes for Emilia Pérez is huge.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: It really is. She shared a Best Actress ensemble award there. She is also preparing to play Linda Ronstadt in an upcoming biopic. Between that and Only Murders in the Building Season 4 returning August 27th, her schedule is packed.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: Yet, she still finds time for her personal life, sharing new photos with boyfriend Benny Blanco just yesterday.
